item.title: CVE-2024-43957|2024-08-29T15:38:22.990Z -- sk.%20abul%20hasan -- animated%20number%20counters
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Sk. Abul Hasan Animated Number Counters allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Animated Number Counters: from n/a through 1.9.
